summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_BOX structure that is initialized with a CD3D11_BOX structure.

param.name: o
param.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_BOX structure that is initialized with a D3D11_BOX structure.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_BOX structure that is initialized with the dimensions of a box.

param.name: Left
param.para: The x-coordinate of the left hand side of the box.

param.name: Top
param.para: The y-coordinate of the top of the box.

param.name: Front
param.para: The z-coordinate of the front of the box.

param.name: Right
param.para: The x-coordinate of the right hand side of the box.

param.name: Bottom
param.para: The y-coordinate of the bottom of the box.

param.name: Back
param.para: The y-coordinate of the back of the box.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of an uninitialized CD3D11_BOX structure.
